snippet: Finance ministers were expected to wrangle on Wednesday over how much capital the European Union's 8,300 banks should be required to hold, James Kanter and Stephen Castle report for The New York Times.
abstract: Finance ministers were expected to wrangle on Wednesday over how much capital the European Union's 8,300 banks should be required to hold, James Kanter and Stephen Castle report for The New York Times.

headline.main: Europe to Weigh New Capital Requirements for Banks
